-- | Pure module for encoding/decoding Google Polyline
--   
--   Pure module for encoding/decoding Google Polyline
@package gpolyline
@version 0.1.0.1


-- | Pure module for encoding and decoding Google Polyline format as
--   specified in
--   https:<i></i>developers.google.com<i>maps</i>documentation<i>utilities</i>polylinealgorithm
module GPolyline
encodeline :: [Point] -> String
encodeunsigned :: Int -> String
decodeline :: String -> [Point]
decodeunsigned :: String -> Int
